瘯瘯瘯

瘯字的基本解释

瘯
cù
癣疥一类的皮肤病。

瘯字的汉语字典释义

[①]［cù］
［《廣韻》千木切，入屋，清。］
(1)皮肤病。亦指患皮肤病。
(2)同“簇”。丛生；丛集。

瘯字的康熙字典解释

【午集中】【疒字部】　瘯； 康熙笔画：16； 页码：页779第11
【廣韻】【集韻】【韻會】?千木切，音蔟。【玉篇】瘯蠡，皮膚病。【左傳·桓六年】謂其不疾瘯蠡也。【疏】瘯蠡，畜之小病，瘯族生疥類是也。蠡則綠生癬類是也。　又【集韻】作木切，音鏃。義同。

瘯字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
瘯字的起名意思

暂无。

Grin
Basic explanation of words
Grin
cù
A skin disease such as ringworm and scabies.
Grin
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［cù］
["Guangyun" Qianmu cuts, enters the house, clears. ]
(1) Skin diseases. Also refers to suffering from skin diseases.
(2) Same as "cluster". Clumped; clustered.
Grin
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Afternoon Concentration] [The Department of Sui Characters] 　瘯; Kangxi Strokes: 16; Page Number: Page 779 No. 11
[Guang Yun] [Ji Yun] [Rhyme Meeting] Thousands of wood cuts, sound clusters. 【Jade articles】Clam, skin disease. [Zuo Zhuan·Huan 6 years] It is said that it is not ill. 【Sparse】Clam, a minor disease of animals, scabies of the clan are also. Li is also green to produce ringworm.　[Jiyun] made wooden cut, sound yin. The same meaning.

Name meaning
Nothing.
cù
сущ. болезнь кожи (животных, род стригущего лишая) (также 瘯蠡 cùluò)
